header.caption: A fullstack developer with passion for the frontend

about_me.description: Hi! I'm Paul Miranda. I'm a software developer with years of experience in web and desktop development. I love being involved in Typescript and Javascript projects. I'm always curious about new technologies and I like to try them as a hobby. I love the frontend developmenet however I build backend applications to keep updated in this area of the development. My main focus these days is to keep upgrading my frontend developer skills and to improve my web and ux designer skills.

introduction.widget-1: Experienced in web development, server side and client side
introduction.widget-2: Worked in backend applications in multiple technologies
introduction.widget-3: Built and coded large scale desktop projects
introduction.widget-4: Built and designed attractive and responsive web designs

projects.heading: My personal projects
projects.pets: I made a social network to upload photos of pets. I took a lot of inspiration from the Instagram design.The photos are cropped and resized in the backend to take less space in disk. It was a very fun project to make, I enjoyed the creation of the components and the styiling.
projects.creative_expo: In my current work, there is a dynamic that an employee can do presentations about whatever topic you are passionate about or find interesting. I talked about CSS Grid because it changes my way of building web layouts. I builded it with react to make interactive examples. My co-workers loved it.
projects.penny: This was a very fun project to make. My girlfriend have a little dog called Penny and we like to share photos and memes of her. I made a web page to know her and a poll to vote for the most epic Penny. I have to learn the basics of firebase to save the poll results of this app.
projects.japanese_project: For my final project of my japanese course I had to make some project that involves all the topics of the course. I thought making a web app would be a great idea because it can persist in the web for future consults about what I saw in the course.

spark_techs.point-1: Worked alongside Skyworks Mexicali in the building and maintainance of industrial machine software. This involved creating and maintaining website and desktop application that the operators of the machines will use to keep control of the industrial production.
spark_techs.point-2: Worked alongside Kenworth Mexicali in the building of a web app to keep control of the quality assurance of the trucks they assemble.
spark_techs.point-3: Colaborated in the SERVCO project, a internal web application to keep control of all the employees inside the organization as well as the control of their payments, vacations, assurances, and all the matters that involves the employee.

application_software.point-1: Builded a web application to help the users to keep control over their KPI's using charts. Builded the backend and frontend of the application.
application_software.point-2: Builded a penitenciary desktop application, made to keep control of the proccesses inside of a jail like the insertion of a convict, hospitalary services, inventories inside the prision and all the proccesses realized inside a prison.
